alert.note: Alert for North Bay Interior Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued November 02 at 8:31PM PDT until November 03 at 9:00AM PDT by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM PDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures from 29F to 35F will result in frost formation. * WHERE...North Bay Interior Valleys. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 9 AM PDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered. Populations sensitive to cold temperatures such as the elderly should take proper precautions, including please do not leave pets outdoors overnight in cold temperatures. Expect near freezing to slightly sub-freezing temperatures for at least a couple hours to as much as several hours especially from near midnight tonight to just after sunrise Thursday morning.
info.instruction: Take steps now to prepare for cold temperatures.
